channel.title: Subject: Is anyone interested in Bitcoin?
channel.description:
The US Dollar based global financial system has many challenges and its complexity is beyond comprehension. What is the impact of huge expansion of currency by the Fed?
While Bitcoin has some detractors, and is not a perfect system, it is a very different economic system than the US Dollar and will be a major force of change over the next 20 years.
Is anyone here a "Bitcoiner"?
Thanks, Rob.

item.title: Subject: Is anyone interested in Bitcoin?
